net.jnellis.binpack

Class LinearBin

  • Object
    • net.jnellis.binpack.LinearBin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Bin<Double,Double>>, Bin<Double,Double>, CapacitySupport<Double>

    public class LinearBin
extends Object
implements Bin<Double,Double>
    A packing bin for storing Double values.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LinearBin(Double capacity)
      Creates a bin that represents an existing bin.
      LinearBin(List<Double> capacities)
      Create a new bin, it will not be marked as an existing bin.

      • LinearBin

        public LinearBin(List<Double> capacities)
        Create a new bin, it will not be marked as an existing bin.
        Parameters:
        capacities - The list of capacities that this bin could have.

      • LinearBin

        public LinearBin(Double capacity)
        Creates a bin that represents an existing bin. An existing bin has a single capacity.
        Parameters:
        capacity - The single capacity of this bin.
